records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-52691 allows an attacker to exploit a directory traversal vulnerability in Smartertools Smartermail, potentially enabling unauthorized access to sensitive files on the server.

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2024-37079 is a vulnerability in VMware Cloud Foundation that allows an authenticated attacker to exploit improper input validation, potentially enabling arbitrary file read access on affected systems.

records.description: CVE-2024-37079 is a vulnerability in VMware Cloud Foundation that allows an authenticated attacker to exploit improper input validation, potentially enabling arbitrary file read access on affected systems.
